chain.label: 在当前标签页打开链接
chain.name: COMMAND_OPEN_LINK_CURRENT
chain.param: javascript:(function() { function copyToClipboard(e) { const htmlContent = `${document.title}`; e.clipboardData.setData('text/html', htmlContent); e.clipboardData.setData('text/plain', `[${document.title}] (${location.href})`); e.preventDefault(); } document.addEventListener('copy', copyToClipboard); document.execCommand('copy'); document.removeEventListener('copy', copyToClipboard); })();
